ISSUE.TITLE: LanguageController/SettingController. Review no-op code and remove or readd Trim()
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/0c856737caff2f5ca11c5e924bd3ba95af3d654b/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Controllers/LanguageController.cs#L369C4-L372 This code seems to do be a no-op. The previous commit [ fd82f495467465e6a01ccd7ee9f17bb421aca8b4](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/fd82f495467465e6a01ccd7ee9f17bb421aca8b4#diff-a567bb503dc5c77cdabf240d84de41a487ca279e5bb9f86e0671b4967ebbc2a1) had `.Trim()` on the end, but `head` has removed it, making it a noop. Please review I am unsure what the expected outcome is ```cs if (model.ResourceName != null) model.ResourceName = model.ResourceName; if (model.ResourceValue != null) model.ResourceValue = model.ResourceValue; ``` Also in `SettingController` https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/0c856737caff2f5ca11c5e924bd3ba95af3d654b/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Controllers/SettingController.cs#L1944C1-L1948C39 ```cs if (model.Name != null) model.Name = model.Name; if (model.Value != null) model.Value = model.Value; ``` and `MappingExtensions.cs` https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/0c856737caff2f5ca11c5e924bd3ba95af3d654b/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Extensions/MappingExtensions.cs#L23C1-L46 ```cs if (trimFields) { if (model.FirstName != null) model.FirstName = model.FirstName; if (model.LastName != null) model.LastName = model.LastName; if (model.Email != null) model.Email = model.Email; if (model.Company != null) model.Company = model.Company; if (model.County != null) model.County = model.County; if (model.City != null) model.City = model.City; if (model.Address1 != null) model.Address1 = model.Address1; if (model.Address2 != null) model.Address2 = model.Address2; if (model.ZipPostalCode != null) model.ZipPostalCode = model.ZipPostalCode; if (model.PhoneNumber != null) model.PhoneNumber = model.PhoneNumber; if (model.FaxNumber != null) model.FaxNumber = model.FaxNumber; } ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7005 Fix database exists problem on install process
